post.body: I had better be that "uber cutie" you're coming to see. Otherwise some kid is going to have to get 4 shot :O.
Damn! Whatever, I'll catch you on later then I guess :].
Dive onto some H3 with me :].
I was actually thinking more along the lines of picking you up from there and hanging out with you.
It would be more entertaining with you by my side, shame you have to go roller skating.
and @StarrliteAddict, how about you both blow on my dick :]?
Laying down to read, frusrated >_<. Don't bother me unless your name starts with "T" and ends with "iairra."
Look at me go clutch and pick the flag up with 5 seconds left ands core under sudden death for the win.
By the way: you all just lost the game :].
Off of Halo for a bit, I need to relax. Going to lay down and read. @StarrliteAddict, call my house when you get a chance.
ORCS
Holy effing shit! Finally I got my 47 in TS!
Diving into a shower and then doing some ranked in H3 with @Felnight.
Mom ninjaed the shower, no laundry for me yet. Hunting down food for my belly and playing some H3.
ARGH. Starting laundry and then diving on some H3 <3.
Awake! Curled up in a blanket sitting here. Hoping on H3 in a bit I guess :].
Getting off for the night. H3 and reading filled day tomorrow. Yay!
Just got home from hanging out with Devin and @StarrliteAddict. My day and night were awesome. I'm currently playing Halo AND on my PC <3.
Running out with @StarrliteAddict and Devin to Gamestop/dinner. I'll be back laterrr :].
Now has an Xbox 360, a 25" computer monitor, and a 17" computer monitor on his desk. 25" is hooked up to the 360, 17" to my PC.
